div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 865 Daeni, c. 75 km. NW of Constanta, Rumania, c. 1957 Burial: c. 250 B.C. (T) Contents: 102 AV. Pot hoard Alexander III: 57 st. Lysimachus: 45 st. Many from Euxine mints Disposition: Bucharest 90 (Inst. Arch. 75; Acad. 15); Galati 12 † Mitrea, Dacia 1958, pp. 493-4; 1959, p. 603 † Iliescu, Caiet selectiv 8 (1963), pp. 326-8 (descrip- tion of 15 coins at Academy: chiefly Alexanders of Callatis, 1 post. Lysimachus from an unc. mint)
